last_episode_to_air.name: L.A. Hair Confidential
last_episode_to_air.overview: Kim Kimble goes behind the scenes of Season 5 and dishes on her new staff, revealing never-before-seen footage. Kim opens the archives of her love life, family life and what pushed Leah over the edge!

name: L.A. Hair
overview: Follows celebrity hair stylist Kim Kimble, as she coifs Hollywood A-listers. When it comes to celebrity hair, Kim is one of the biggest names in Hollywood. From movies to music, Kim is an image maker and a trendsetter. Beyonce, Mary J. Blige, Kelly Rowland and Shakira are just a handful of A-listers who keep Kim's number on speed dial so she can whip up their custom styles and images for glamorous events. While handling her star-studded clientèle is a full time job, this elite style queen also manages a successful retail product line and runs an exclusive Hollywood salon staffed with talented but high-strung stylists, including her mother! Rivalry is fierce and the desire to be on top is even fiercer. Hair isn't the only thing in this salon that gets cut

episodes.name: Sheer Ambition
episodes.overview: Kim questions Angela's integrity and lack of professionalism. Kelly Rowland needs Kim's help finding a hot style for a high-fashion editorial shoot. Angela and Terry go on a house call from hell.

episodes.name: Charity Case
episodes.overview: After diffusing an insulting situation with reality diva Omarosa, Kim gives a candid interview about her painful childhood. Angela steals one of Kim's clients. Everyone has had enough of Charity

episodes.name: Divas Divided
episodes.overview: Malaka sabotages Anthony's weave which sparks a fight that lands him back in beauty school. Kim turns the salon into a VIP suite for artists attending the Grammy Awards. Terry steals China's celebrity client.

episodes.name: Wigged Out
episodes.overview: A drunk Angela attacks China while Kim and Leah fight over unfinished business.

episodes.name: China Wages War
episodes.overview: Construction of the new salon stalls and Kim is forced to find a temporary location. The war with China takes a nasty turn. Kim styles R&B icons Brandy and Monica for a music video.

episodes.name: Tick Tick Boom
episodes.overview: China loses her cool with everyone in the salon, including one of the clients. Kim cuts her hair too short before her second date with Frank. China breaks down and tries to resign as salon manager.

episodes.name: The Big Blow Out
episodes.overview: Kim clashes with fellow celebrity stylist, Jonathan Antin over creating a wig for Gretchen Rossi of The Real Housewives of Orange County. Ray J gets stuck in the middle of a fight between Lisa and Naja.

episodes.name: L.A. Hair Confidential
episodes.overview: In this one hour special, Kim explains the complexities of hair styles we saw this season while guiding us through the season's highlights, including celebrity clients and never before seen moments.

episodes.name: The Nail Biter
episodes.overview: Kim opens a new salon but is undecided about Angela. Kim's sister replaces China as manager. And a newly hired celebrity nail stylist wreaks havoc.

episodes.name: Demotion Commotion
episodes.overview: Kim styles Letoya Luckett and gives Angela a second chance. Leah and Naja nearly come to blows at the salon.

episodes.name: What Happens in Vegas
episodes.overview: A salon contest derails, Naja seduces Dontay in Vegas.

episodes.name: VIP Blow Out
episodes.overview: Rumors begin to swirl around Naja and Dontay after they return from Las Vegas; Kim loses patience with Leah and her hair; and things between Angela and China remain heated.

episodes.name: Hater from Decatur
episodes.overview: Dontay is ordered to assist Terry; Anthony is promoted; Kim's Fendi chair finally arrives.

episodes.name: Don't Mess with My Mama
episodes.overview: Kim styles the Kevan Hall fashion show. Dontay throws a party. Anthony risks his job after he insults Jas. Terry styles Kyla Pratt.

episodes.name: Career Suicide
episodes.overview: Kim demotes Anthony to assistant as punishment for disrespecting her mother; Naja and Leah battle over a mani-pedi station.

episodes.name: She Wet the Wig
episodes.overview: China is kicked out of a photo shoot with Vivica Fox after she gives the actress attitude. Kim styles Somaya Reece and hires a sexy new receptionist.

episodes.name: Drinking and Weaving
episodes.overview: Kim styles Somaya Reece. Naja and China fight over her failed shoot with Vivica Fox. Leah loses it after stylists return drunk from a break.

episodes.name: Bringing Sexy Back
episodes.overview: Kim styles Michelle Williams for her latest album cover. Angela leaves for Thailand without notice. Leah and Kim fight over a photo shoot.

episodes.name: You're Fired
episodes.overview: Kim cuts ties & does a favor for Chaka.

episodes.name: L.A. Hair Confidential
episodes.overview: Never before seen moments, including what happened after Angela got fired. Kim also reveals her own celebrity styling secrets.

episodes.name: Chair Battle Royale
episodes.overview: Kim styles Gabrielle Union as Dontay plots to leave the Kimble salon and join Angela. Anthony feuds with the new female barber, Lisa.

episodes.name: A Thin Line Between Love and Fake
episodes.overview: Kim gives Macy Gray big hair and tries to mediate Lisa and Anthony's fight. Angela ends up in a fight with Naja at her own salon launch party.

episodes.name: Hotlanta, Hair We Come
episodes.overview: Kim styles SWV and opens a pop-up shop in Atlanta; Leah is fed up with Kim's orders. Akon sets Anthony straight as Naja and Angela fight.

episodes.name: Lisa and the Ratcheteers
episodes.overview: Kim and Leah continue to fight. Kim styles American Idol winner, Candice Glover. Naja calls Lisa ratchet and Ray J referees their argument.

episodes.name: Stick a Fork in It
episodes.overview: Drama floods the Queen Mary after Angela crashes Kim's celebratory dinner for her new wigs. China threatens to stab Angela. Lisa grooms Too Short.

episodes.name: Put It on Record
episodes.overview: Mistreating a client gets someone fired. Kim trades places and models for a magazine. Naja attempts to set a world record for most manicures done.

episodes.name: A Tale of Two Cakes
episodes.overview: A celebration erupts into a salon clearing brawl when simmering hostilities between Lisa and Jana are sparked by a flip comment from Dontay.

episodes.name: Big Hair, Don't Care
episodes.overview: Lisa and Naja's fight leaves the salon in turmoil. Kim returns to Atlanta to headline the country's biggest hair show. Leah runs home in a rage.

episodes.name: 99 Problems, But Hair Ain't One
episodes.overview: Kim risks her hair empire with an extreme business move; Leah is outraged. Naja returns with shocking news; Lisa gets a surprise proposal.

episodes.name: I'm the Boss, Hunty!
episodes.overview: A mysterious envelope and surprise proposal from celebrity stylist Jonathan Antin. A new hire sparks trouble in the salon, and a key stylist is fired when Kim is pushed to her limits. Kim styles Mary J. Blige.

episodes.name: Catwalk, Cat Fight
episodes.overview: Kim styles Tia Mowry. The Kimble team works at LA Fashion Week, and sparks fly as they share limited backstage space with Dontay and Angela. Jonathan is impressed. Kim is shocked by Naja's return to the salon.

episodes.name: Nail'd by Naja
episodes.overview: Naja's return shocks Kim. Kim is pissed when Jonathan is extremely late for a meeting. The stylists rebel. Dontay fights for his job.

episodes.name: Wigs in the Wild
episodes.overview: Kim styles Zendaya while Dontay pleads for his job back. Meltdowns ensue when Kim takes the stylists to a remote team-building camp.

episodes.name: Lights, Camera, Meltdown
episodes.overview: Kim busts her staff when she hires secret shoppers. An infomercial training shoot gets tense when Jonathan's blunt direction insults Kim.

episodes.name: Model Behavior
episodes.overview: Kim makes Gocha project manager, but when she shows up late, all hell breaks loose. Angela approaches Jonathan. Kim styles Erica Campbell.

episodes.name: A Hair-Raising Proposal
episodes.overview: Kim and Jonathan agree to move forward with their partnership, but Kim explodes when she sees Jonathan's proposed contract. Anthony and Naja are suspicious of Gocha and Angela. Kim styles actress La La Anthony.

episodes.name: The Kim-pire Strikes Back
episodes.overview: Kim is shocked to discover that Jonathan has bought out her inventory of hair bags, and sends her stylists on a secret mission to his salon. Anthony & Gocha spar at a video shoot. Kim styles Garcelle Beauvais.

episodes.name: Weave Got an Informant!
episodes.overview: Anthony confronts Angela about their relationship. Kim styles LaTavia Roberson. A meeting with a major beauty distributor could mean big business for Kim. A secret about Gocha creates chaos at the salon.

episodes.name: Hair Today, Gone Tomorrow
episodes.overview: Kim confronts Jonathan after he tries to buy her salon, and questions Gocha about her loyalty. Kim styles K. Michelle. Leah plans a last-minute party for Kim, where Kim makes an announcement that causes chaos.

episodes.name: Time for Some Hair-apy
episodes.overview: Jonathan enrages Kim when he talks about her on live TV. Terry and Gocha must co-manage the salon, while Leah explores a new business venture. A snitch gets Gocha kicked to the curb. Kim styles Teyana Taylor.

episodes.name: Snitches Get Stitches
episodes.overview: Kim tests Terry & Gocha's management skills by having them organize a staff photo shoot, which explodes into chaos. Leah meets with Jonathan. Gocha shares a secret with Dontay. Kim styles actress Elise Neal.

episodes.name: Shade and Betrayed
episodes.overview: Kim names the new manager for her salon. Terry forms an unlikely alliance. In Atlanta for the Bronner Brothers Hair Show, chaos erupts when Gocha reveals her "Plan B" and Terry makes a shocking announcement.

episodes.name: L.A. Hair Confidential
episodes.overview: Kim reunites with her staff, and rival Jonathan Antin, to discuss the highlights of Season 4. Motives are exposed, exclusive footage revealed, and Kim reunites with Terry for the first time since he quit.

episodes.name: I Snatched Your Weave!
episodes.overview: The sheers come out during Kim’s wig and champagne bar launch event. Gocha crashes the party bearing shade. Jay’s assistant role pushes her over the edge. Stylists come to blows, forcing cameras to shut down!

episodes.name: Put Your Business Panties On!
episodes.overview: Kim does damage control after a blowout; Jay and Giorgio might be fired it they don't do makeup; and Kim takes on her biggest business venture yet, when she pitches her new line of products to HSN.

episodes.name: Hair Du Soleil!
episodes.overview: Kim is planning a hair opera! Leah is put in the director's chair. Disaster strikes when business & family collide. A desperate Kim hires back Gocha!

episodes.name: Hair We Go!
episodes.overview: Kim fights to pull off the hair opera for the sake of her family and her business. Later, project manager Gocha stirs trouble amongst the stylists; and Leah is pushed to her breaking point.

episodes.name: L.A. Hair Confidential
episodes.overview: Kim Kimble goes behind the scenes of Season 5 and dishes on her new staff, revealing never-before-seen footage. Kim opens the archives of her love life, family life and what pushed Leah over the edge!
